issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: ClientRMProtocol.getAllApplications should accept ApplicationType as a parameter

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: ClientRMProtocol.getAllApplications should accept ApplicationType as a parameter---MR changes

comments.body: @Xuan, will mapreduce jobs have different application types or only a single fixed type for all MR jobs? If the latter, the getAllJobs() should not be taking application type as an argument.
@Hitesh, you are right. We do not need MR api changes in this case.
Overall patch being reviewed as part of YARN-727. Will be committed together to ensure build does not break.

Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #4056 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/4056/])
    YARN-727, MAPREDUCE-5325. ClientRMProtocol.getAllApplications should accept ApplicationType as a parameter. Contributed by Xuan Gong. (Revision 1501599)

     Result = SUCCESS
hitesh : http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/?root=Apache-SVN&view=rev&rev=1501599
